acpoweradapter: AC Adapter EH-5b (used in combination with the Power Connector EP-5A)
burstrate: Up to 6 shots at approx. 8 frames per second
whitebalancemodes: Color Temp., Cloudy, Daylight, Flash, Fluorescent (FL1 to FL3), Incandescent, Preset Manual, Auto 1, Auto 2
lens: NIKKOR ED glass lens,  13 elements in 10 groups (2 ED lens elements), 6.0-42.8mm (35mm format equivalent: 28-200mm),  f/2-4
connectivity: Audio/video (A/V) output; Digital I/O (USB); External microphone connector (Stereo mini-pin jack (3.5 mm diameter); HDMI mini connector C; Accessory terminal
fileformats: Still: JPEG, RAW; Sound: WAV; Movies: MOV
flashmodes: TTL auto flash with monitor preflashes, Manual flash control available
exposuremodes: Programmed auto exposure with flexible programs: aperture-priority auto, exposure bracketing (Tv, Av, Sv) , manual, shutter priority auto; Exposure compensation (-3.0 to +3.0 EV in steps of 1/3 EV)
shutter: Mechanical and CMOS electronic shutter: 60 - 1/4000 sec
focusrange: W: 50cm to infinity; T: 80 cm to infinity; Macro: 2 cm to infinity
